GK19damkuttu:2073: sevante hṛdyarasāṃ rāgatarau Mañjarīṃ dhanyāḥ // DKuṭṭ_1037 //
GK19damkuttu:2074: tiṣṭhatu tadaṅgasaṅgo vilokitā yena jhagiti varagātrī /
GK19damkuttu:2077: viddhi narādhipa teṣāṃ dūrībhūtaṃ prajākāryam // DKuṭṭ_1039 //
GK19damkuttu:2078: āsthā kā khalu tasyā viṣayagrahadurbaleṣu puruṣeṣu /
GK19damkuttu:2080: dagdhvāpi punardagdho nūnamanaṅgaḥ Hareṇa tāṃ tanvīm /
GK19damkuttu:2081: dṛṣṭvāpi yena tiṣṭhasi nirākulaḥ svasthavṛttena // DKuṭṭ_1041 //
GK19damkuttu:2087: nijagāda cārubhāṣiṇi gītikayā samayasammataṃ kathitam // DKuṭṭ_1044 //
GK19damkuttu:2088: abhinandya sā tatheti prayayau pramadāvatī nijaṃ bhavanam /
GK19damkuttu:2089: akarocca viditakāryāṃ yukte 'vasare manoramāṃ gaṇikām // DKuṭṭ_1045 //
GK19damkuttu:2095: adya madanaḥ prasanno bhāgyacayairadya pariṇataṃ phalataḥ // DKuṭṭ_1048 //
GK19damkuttu:2097: tvayi vitarati sasnehaṃ nirāmayapraśnabhāratīṃ tasyāḥ // DKuṭṭ_1049 //
GK19damkuttu:2099: audāsīnyaṃ bhajatāṃ samāgatā bhavati nālikā yūnām // DKuṭṭ_1050 //
GK19damkuttu:2101: yāmo vayaṃ na rājati vijanasthitamithunasaṃnidhāvaparaḥ // DKuṭṭ_1051 //
GK19damkuttu:2103: tvamapi ratisamaraśūraḥ svargabhuvaḥ santu kuśalāya // DKuṭṭ_1052 //
GK19damkuttu:2106: iti śūnyīkṛtaveśmani harati śanaiḥ sahajamaṃśukaṃ tasmin /
GK19damkuttu:2107: darśitasādhvasalajjā jagāda sā kiṃ karoṣīti // DKuṭṭ_1054 //
GK19damkuttu:2109: iti nigaditasasmeraḥ smaravidhurita ātatāna ratikalaham // DKuṭṭ_1055 //
GK19damkuttu:2111: Verses 1056-1059 are found only in two Nepalese manuscripts and in two editions.
GK19damkuttu:2113: gaṇikāsau rājasutaṃ tvagasthiśeṣaṃ mumoca nāticirāt // DKuṭṭ_1056 //
